content: 2dc x 4 dcinc slip_stitch 32 r25 7sc 7sc on left arm 11sc 7sc on - f/o and weave in end right arm 3sc 35 this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free @nywynscorner - continue to crochet head straight r21 5sc decrease x 6 36 up from r33 of body r22 4sc decrease x 6 30 - work in spiral stuff firmly r23 3sc decrease x 6 24 r1 12inc 24 r24 2sc decrease x 6 18 r2 3sc increase x 6 30 r25 1sc decrease x 6 12 r3 4sc increase x 6 36 r26 6dec 6 r4 5sc increase x 6 42 - fasten_off and leave long tail pass r5 6sc increase x 6 48 the tail through 6 fls of r26 to r6 7sc increase x 6 54 close the hole hide tail inside r7 - r10 54sc 4 rounds - 54 - attach 10mm safety eyes at r12- r11 28sc decrease 10sc decrease 12sc 52 r13 with 10 stitches in between r12 11sc decrease x 4 48 - sew the nose at r10-r11 over 3 r13 - r19 48sc 7 rounds - 48 stitches r20 6sc decrease x 6 42 this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free skirt chain at the beginning of r does not - join color c yarn into 32th st of r1 count as a stitch the 3rd stitch of the 3sc in last chain part 1 r7 4sc ch30 skip 6ch to make button hole 24sc on the chain 22sc ch30 skip - join color b yarn into 1st fl of fl 6ch to make button hole 24sc on the round that left from r11 of body chain 4sc f/o and weave in end r1 ch2 dcinc x 30 slip_stitch 60 - sew 3 buttons to the skirt as in photo r2 ch2 dcinc double_crochet x 30 slip_stitch 90 r3 - r6 ch2 90dc slip_stitch 4 rounds - 90 r7 ch3 skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st x 45 slip_stitch f/o and weave in end part 2 - use color c work around foundation chain r1 ch31 29sc 3sc in last chain 29sc ch6 to make button hole or more depends on your button slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet r2 ch2 blo dcinc 3dc in 1 st x 15 75 r3 ch1 flip your work 75sc 75 r4 ch2 flip 75dc 75 r5 ch1 flip 75sc 75 @nywynscorner r6 ch1 flip slip_stitch ch3 skip 1 st slip_stitch into next st x 37 f/o and weave in end this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed
